hero.description:
👋 Hi! I'm Daniel, a frontend developer with a strong foundation in UI/UX design and digital strategy. I’ve collaborated with top brands across Latin America on projects that blend clean code, thoughtful design, and marketing impact.

I specialize in building fast, responsive, and visually polished interfaces using Vue, Angular, and React. I’m also Meta-certified Digital Associate/Media Buying Professional 💼, with hands-on experience leading digital campaigns and optimizing user journeys.

My work is driven by creativity, precision, and a desire to make technology intuitive and human-centered. I love learning, collaborating, and helping others grow — whether through design, code, or strategy.

Let’s connect!

about.title: About
about.description:
Hi! I’m Daniel, a passionate web developer with nearly a decade of experience in the digital world. Since 2015, I’ve been immersed in the creation of websites and digital interfaces, blending design, strategy, and technology to craft meaningful user experiences.

While my current focus is on frontend development, my background includes roles as a multimedia designer, UI/UX designer, and web designer. I love contributing to projects from every angle — technical implementation, user experience, design aesthetics, and strategic impact.

I’m deeply driven by the idea of building technology that’s useful, intuitive, and genuinely helpful for people. I enjoy clean, well-structured, purpose-driven projects with clear goals and real-world value.

Beyond code, I’m also a creative soul — in my free time, you’ll find me experimenting with personal tech ideas or producing music that blends rock and electronic vibes.

My long-term goal is to become a well-rounded full-stack or cross-platform software developer, capable of delivering great solutions wherever they’re needed.
